article.title: Lockheed Martin to Provide Periscope Detection Radar
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Mission Systems and Sensors, Owego, New York, is being awarded a more than $33 million contract modification to incorporate the automatic radar periscope detection and discrimination radar into six MH-60R/MH-60S full rate production aircraft.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
